00031 #ifndef SC_MODULE_REGISTRY_H
00032 #define SC_MODULE_REGISTRY_H
00033 
00034 
00035 namespace sc_core {
00036 
00037 class sc_module;
00038 class sc_simcontext;
00039 
00040 
00041 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 //  CLASS : sc_module_registry
00043 //
00044 //  Registry for all modules.
00045 //  FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY!
00046 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 
00048 class sc_module_registry
00049 {
00050     friend class sc_simcontext;
00051 
00052 public:
00053 
00054     void insert( sc_module& );
00055     void remove( sc_module& );
00056 
00057     int size() const
00058         { return m_module_vec.size(); }
00059 
00060 private:
00061 
00062     // constructor
00063     explicit sc_module_registry( sc_simcontext& simc_ );
00064 
00065     // destructor
00066     ~sc_module_registry();
00067 
00068     // called when construction is done
00069     bool construction_done();
00070 
00071     // called when elaboration is done
00072     void elaboration_done();
00073 
00074     // called before simulation begins
00075     void start_simulation();
00076 
00077     // called after simulation ends
00078     void simulation_done();
00079 
00080 
00081 private:
00082 
00083     int                     m_construction_done;
00084     std::vector<sc_module*> m_module_vec;
00085     sc_simcontext*          m_simc;
00086 
00087 private:
00088 
00089     // disabled
00090     sc_module_registry();
00091     sc_module_registry( const sc_module_registry& );
00092     sc_module_registry& operator = ( const sc_module_registry& );
00093 };
00094 
00095 } // namespace sc_core
00096 
00097 #endif
